review:
I have been suffering from heavy menstrual bleeding and cramps for more than 5 years. The diagnosis from multiple doctors had been endometriosis but the subsequent treatments never offered a permanent solution with relapses.
This is when i decided to consult Dr Shwetha based on a personal recommendation and the experience has been very satisfactory. The key has been the remarkable amount of patience in listening to my concerns, and then carefully explaining the diagnosis and the required treatment. She recommended laparoscopic surgery to treat the endometrosis. She also carefully explained the potential outcomes and clarified all our doubts. During the surgery, there was adhesiolysis performed due to extensive abdominal adhesion that was observed.
Post surgery recovery consultation and support was also exemplary, and she has been available on phone for any clarifications. Hence, the overall experience has been very pleasant and i would definitely recommend Dr Shwetha Kamath for any of your gynecological/obstetric needs.
